title: Font Identification
content:
anyone know what font this is?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121114535im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/deletemenow_4164.jpg)

 [‹ Google logo redrawn by thousands of kids](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121114535/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45615 "Go to previous forum topic") [Happy happy Ligatures ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121114535/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45679 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Jack Clements

comments.content:
there’s an entire forum section dedicated to this purpose, and the people who want to help you identify your font will be expecting to find it there.

You might get an answer here, but next time please post it in the proper forum section and you’ll probably get a much quicker response!
I meant to post it there.... ty
